name: Designing for Crypto: How to Prevent Building Another Inequitable System
description:
I created these slides for the Lesbians Who Tech Summit where I tried to break down complex crypto design experiences and draw parallels between the current tech ecosystem and web3/crypto â€“ UX patterns, user flows, current issues, and most importantly why designers should care about the future of this industry.


Because accessibility is virtually non-existent in crypto products, this talk will also cover how designers can ensure inclusive and accessible design within their web3 organizations.
